Reviews.Title: Great little mount.
Reviews.Author: James E. Hobbs "Sound Emperor"
Reviews.Content: This unit its built well and easy to use.  Used for mounting PTZ cameras to custom wall brackets.  Worked perfectly.

ProductInfo.Features:
Shaft screws into the adjusting knuckle. For an ultra low-profile mount, screw directly to one of our Mounting Bases!
Quality manufactured and fully adjustable: 210-degrees Tilt, 360-degrees Turn & 360-degrees Rotation
Knob and tamper-resistant set-screw adjusting options included
Overall knuckle height approximately 2.5-Inch (63.5mm)
0.25-Inch 20 mounting stud with lockring
ProductInfo.Name: Panavise 851-00 Knuckle Adjustable Knob and Screw (Black)
